swapEtherToToken(address,uint256).details: swaps the `msg.value` Ether to at least `minAmount` of tokens in `address`, or reverts

params.minAmount: The minimum amount of tokens transferred to msg.sender
params.token: The address of ERC-20 token to swap

returns._0: The actual amount of transferred tokens
